title: Johnny Depp thanks fans for trusting him after tough year as he gives emotional People's Choice Awards speech
text:
Johnny Depp thanks fans for trusting him after tough year as he gives emotional People's Choice Awards speech The actor split from wife Amber Heard and also lost his beloved mother Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Johnny Depp surprised fans as he took to the stage at the People's Choice Awards on Wednesday night. 
And he used it as an opportunity to thank his fans for their support following a tough year. 
"I came here for one reason, and one reason only," the actor told the audience at the Microsoft Theatre in Los Angeles as he collected his coveted gong for Favourite Movie Icon. 
"I came here for you, the people, who through whatever good times or bad have stood by me and trusted me. Thank you. Actor Johnny Depp accepts Favorite Movie Icon onstage (Photo: FilmMagic, Inc) Actor Johnny Depp accepts Favorite Movie Icon onstage (Photo: FilmMagic, Inc) 
"You very graciously invited me here once again tonight. I appreciate it. You have no idea how much I appreciate it. I was very deeply affected by the kindness of your recognition and your well wishes to me and my family. 
"Why it is especially meaningful for me to be here in front of you is to say thank you and tell you that I truly feel the need to thank you. Actor Johnny Depp accepts Favorite Movie Icon onstage (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
"Because in all honesty we all know that none of us, especially me, would not be standing up here if it wasn't for all of you." 
He then also paid tribute to his beloved mother Betty Sue who passed away last May at the age of 81. 
"Give 'em hell Betty Sue," he shared beore walking off stage.
